description: Little Spoon, big flavor! What's better than pudding? FROZEN PUDDING! We make every batch of rich, creamy pudding ourselves and add in all-natural, handmade ingredients before we put it through a special process to become everything ice cream wishes it could be. The best part? Frozen pudding doesn't melt-- it just becomes pudding!  It's always time for a pudding party! If you're throwing a birthday party, wedding, bar mitzvah, bat mitzvah, druid tree ceremony, girl scout rave, family reunion, intervention, or any other type of festivity, we can make it even sweeter with our awesome custom-made pudding cart. Need to liven things up at the office or reward your cast and crew on set? We do that, too!We'll show up with as many pudding cups as you need to take your event to the next level and all of your guests can marvel at your genius when they discover their new favorite frozen treat!
name: little spoon frozen pudding
